I led the development of this game for UCLA ACM Studio's inaugural game jam, which has the theme "Break the Cycle". Out of 17 entries, the game **got #1 in all but two categories**.

![](imgs/dbtb_results.png){width=50%}

## My Role

- Implemented game features including
  - Horizontal bike spin
  - Vertical bike spin
  - Scoring system
- Designed UI/UX
- Directed camera movement
- Designed and implemented 6 levels
